name: Heme B
description: Essential iron-containing molecule for oxygen binding.

name: Glucose
description: Primary energy source for cellular metabolism.

name: Caffeine
description: CNS stimulant that blocks adenosine receptors.

name: ATP
description: The primary energy currency of the cell.

name: Penicillin G
description: Treats bacterial infections by targeting cell walls.

name: Dopamine
description: Chemical messenger for reward and motor control.

name: Cholesterol
description: Component of cell membranes and precursor to steroids.
